title: "Bot Alert Background"
content: Welcome to Bot Alert Background! Our website provides a sleek and modern wallpaper featuring a simple graphic of a virtual assistant or chatbot. This wallpaper is perfect for anyone who wants to add a touch of tech-savvy style to their desktop or mobile device. The design includes space for messages and alerts, making it both practical and visually appealing. With a gradient background that fades from one color to another, this wallpaper is sure to catch the eye and add a pop of color to any screen. Whether you're a fan of virtual assistants or just looking for a stylish new wallpaper, Bot Alert Background has got you covered.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple graphic of a virtual assistant or chatbot, with space for messages and alerts, set against a gradient background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
